=== clutter-1.0-1.2.10 ===

* Looks for dlopen, but then only sets an Automake conditional, so
	  add a test for HAVE_LIBDL to clutter/Makefile.am, and also add
	  $(LIBDL) to libclutter_@CLUTTER_WINSYS@_@CLUTTER_API_VERSION@_la_LIBADD

# When linking with --as-needed, libdl is required in clutter/Makefile.am
	if HAVE_LIBDL
	LIBDL = -ldl
	endif
	....
	libclutter_@CLUTTER_WINSYS@_@CLUTTER_API_VERSION@_la_LIBADD +=
	$(LIBDL) \
* http://bugzilla.clutter-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=2229

* bzr has: ERROR in annotation: can't find parameter n_properies referenced by parameter values of 'animatev'

=== Patch ===
<pre>
=== modified file 'clutter/Makefile.am'
--- clutter/Makefile.am	2010-03-01 15:25:45 +0000
+++ clutter/Makefile.am	2010-07-21 16:29:26 +0000
@@ -20,6 +20,10 @@
 EXTRA_DIST =
 BUILT_SOURCES =

+if HAVE_LIBDL
+LIBDL = -ldl
+endif
+
 if WINSYS_WIN32
 
# Ideally this resources stuff would go in win32/ but libtool doesn't
@@ -224,6 +228,7 @@
 	$(top_builddir)/clutter/cogl/pango/libcoglpango.la \
 	$(top_builddir)/clutter/$(CLUTTER_WINSYS)/libclutter-$(CLUTTER_WINSYS).la \
 	$(clutter_json_libadd) \
+	$(LIBDL) \
 	$(CLUTTER_WINSYS_BASE_LIB)
 
 libclutter_@CLUTTER_WINSYS@_@CLUTTER_API_VERSION@_la_DEPENDENCIES = \

</pre>
